text: "Jaded" is a 2001 song by American hard rock band Aerosmith and is the leading single from their 13th studio album Just Push Play. It went to number 7 in the United States, number 13 in the United Kingdom, number 51 in Australia, number 41 in New Zealand, number 9 in Scotland, number 11 in Italy, number 6 in Canada and number 42 in Ireland. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2002. ==Track listings== == References == Category:2001 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Aerosmith songs
title: Jaded (Aerosmith song)
